verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> to my <S%H136>Lord:<s%> <S%H3427>"Sit<s%> at My <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> I <S%H7896>make<s%> Thine <S%H340>enemies<s%> a <S%H1916>footstool<s%> <S%H7272><s%> for Thy <S%H7272>feet.<s%>"

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7971>stretch<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> Thy <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>scepter<s%> from <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> [saying], <S%H7287>"Rule<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of Thine <S%H340>enemies.<s%>"

Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H5071>volunteer<s%> <S%H5071>freely<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of Thy <S%H2428>power;<s%> In <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1926>array,<s%> from the <S%H7358>womb<s%> of the <S%H4891>dawn,<s%> Thy <S%H3208>youth<s%> are to Thee [as] the <S%H2919>dew.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> and will not <S%H5162>change<s%> His <S%H5162>mind,<s%> "Thou art a <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> <S%H5921>According<s%> to the <S%H1700>order<s%> of <S%H4442>Melchizedek.<s%>"
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> is at Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand;<s%> He will <S%H4272>shatter<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of His <S%H639>wrath.<s%>

He will <S%H1777>judge<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> He will <S%H4390>fill<s%> [them] with <S%H1472>corpses,<s%> He will <S%H4272>shatter<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H7218>men<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> a <S%H7227>broad<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>
He will <S%H8354>drink<s%> from the <S%H5158>brook<s%> by the <S%H1870>wayside;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> He will <S%H7311>lift<s%> up [His] <S%H7218>head.<s%>
